org.pepstock.charba.client

Class GlobalOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.AbstractItem
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.global.Options
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.GlobalOptions

  • public final class GlobalOptions
extends Options
    Contains the GLOBAL options for a specific chart instance.
    Loaded when a new chart instance is created.
    It's the result of merging of different global options.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
